attributes.action: Set vat dynamically up to max 17.5%.
attributes.background: I.e. If Google only pay 3% then we should only pay vat to that company of 3% on goods purchased. If we pay 17.5% then 14.5%, that could have gone to the NHS, won't end up in Barbados.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition as it is not clear what you are asking the UK Government and Parliament to do.
